## All Learning Content

## 📚 Pre-Curated Learning Paths

- [ ] [**Foundation: AI-First Engineering**](paths/foundation-ai-first-engineering.md)
  *Foundation* • Build proficiency in AI-powered documentation, research, and code generation through hands-on practice with AI-assisted development workflows
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, GitHub Copilot Chat, VS Code, Architecture Decision Records, Task Planning, Azure, Terraform

- [ ] [**Intermediate: DevOps Excellence**](paths/intermediate-devops-excellence.md)
  *Skill* • Deploy, troubleshoot, and optimize edge-to-cloud systems with advanced deployment patterns and diagnostic techniques
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** Terraform, Azure Arc, Azure IoT Operations, Kubernetes, GitOps, Azure

- [ ] [**Intermediate: Infrastructure Architect**](paths/intermediate-infrastructure-architect.md)
  *Skill* • Design and deploy edge-to-cloud infrastructure with architectural rigor using ADRs and deployment automation
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** Architecture Decision Records, Terraform, Azure Arc, Azure IoT Operations, Kubernetes, Azure

- [ ] [**Expert: Data & Analytics Integration**](paths/expert-data-analytics-integration.md)
  *Expert* • Build edge-to-cloud data pipelines with Microsoft Fabric Real-Time Intelligence for advanced analytics
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** Microsoft Fabric, Azure IoT Operations, EventStream, Eventhouse, KQL (Kusto Query Language), Power BI, MQTT, Terraform

- [ ] [**Expert: Enterprise Integration Specialist**](paths/expert-enterprise-integration.md)
  *Expert* • Orchestrate complex multi-system integrations at enterprise scale with comprehensive task planning and cross-team coordination
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, Azure IoT Operations, Microsoft Fabric, EventStream, KQL (Kusto Query Language), Azure, Terraform, Architecture Decision Records

## 🥋 Katas by Difficulty

### ⭐ Foundation Level (16 katas)

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Configure Azure DevOps MCP Server**](katas/ado-automation/100-configure-mcp-server.md)
  *Foundation | 15 min* • Learn to configure the Azure DevOps Model Context Protocol server for GitHub Copilot integration with PAT token authentication and connection verification
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** Azure DevOps, MCP (Model Context Protocol), GitHub Copilot, Azure CLI

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Discover Single Work Item**](katas/ado-automation/100-single-work-item-discovery.md)
  *Foundation | 23 min* • Learn to query and discover individual Azure DevOps work items using MCP commands with ID-based lookup and title search patterns
  **Prerequisites:** ado-automation-100-configure-mcp-server • **Technologies:** Azure DevOps, MCP, Work Items, GitHub Copilot

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Basic Messaging Architecture**](katas/adr-creation/100-basic-messaging-architecture.md)
  *Foundation | 60 min* • Learn foundational ADR creation through systematic evaluation and documentation of messaging technology decisions for distributed systems
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** Architecture Decision Records, MQTT, Apache Kafka, GitHub Copilot

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - AI Development Fundamentals**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/100-ai-development-fundamentals.md)
  *Foundation | 30 min* • Learn AI-assisted, hyper-velocity engineering through hands-on practice with prompts, instructions, and chat modes
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, GitHub Copilot Chat, VS Code, AI-assisted development

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Conversation Checkpoint Restore**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/100-conversation-checkpoint-restore.md)
  *Foundation | 25 min* • Learn when and how to restore conversation checkpoints for efficient workflow recovery and context management
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot Chat, VS Code

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Conversation Clearing Strategy**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/100-conversation-clearing-strategy.md)
  *Foundation | 25 min* • Learn when to clear conversations, manage VS Code conversation history limits, and maintain efficient context boundaries
  **Prerequisites:** ai-assisted-engineering-100-conversation-checkpoint-restore • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot Chat, VS Code

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - GitHub Copilot Modes**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/100-copilot-modes.md)
  *Foundation | 30 min* • Learn GitHub Copilot mode mechanics including Ask, Edit, and Agent modes with practical workflows for effective mode selection and transitions
  **Prerequisites:** ai-assisted-engineering-100-ai-development-fundamentals • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, GitHub Copilot Chat, GitHub Copilot Edit Mode, GitHub Copilot Agent Mode, VS Code

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Getting Started Basics**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/100-getting-started-basics.md)
  *Foundation | 45 min* • Learn AI-assisted project onboarding and first deployment using the getting-started prompt to deploy your first Edge AI blueprint
  **Prerequisites:** ai-assisted-engineering-100-ai-development-fundamentals • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, Azure, Terraform

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Inline Chat Quick Edits**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/100-inline-chat-quick-edits.md)
  *Foundation | 30 min* • Learn GitHub Copilot's inline chat with Ctrl+I for rapid selection-based edits, refactoring, and convention-aware modifications to Terraform and Bicep code
  **Prerequisites:** ai-assisted-engineering-100-inline-suggestions-basics • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, Terraform, Bicep, Visual Studio Code

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Inline Suggestions Basics**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/100-inline-suggestions-basics.md)
  *Foundation | 30 min* • Learn GitHub Copilot's inline suggestions with Tab acceptance, Alt+] navigation, and comment-driven development for Terraform and Bicep IaC workflows
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, Terraform, Bicep, Visual Studio Code

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Deployment Basics**](katas/edge-deployment/100-deployment-basics.md)
  *Foundation | 30 min* • Develop AI-assisted deployment workflows using structured guidance to deploy edge infrastructure and handle deployment failures in production environments
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** Terraform, Azure, GitHub Copilot

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Edge Resource Management and Optimization**](katas/edge-deployment/100-resource-management.md)
  *Foundation | 45 min* • Learn to deploy and optimizing Azure IoT Operations blueprints in resource-constrained edge environments with effective monitoring and troubleshooting strategies...
  **Prerequisites:** edge-deployment-100-deployment-basics • **Technologies:** Terraform, Azure, Kubernetes

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Fabric RTI Blueprint Deployment**](katas/fabric-integration/100-fabric-rti-blueprint-deployment.md)
  *Foundation | 90 min* • Deploy fabric-rti Terraform blueprint to connect Edge AI infrastructure with Microsoft Fabric Real-Time Intelligence
  **Prerequisites:** fabric-integration-200-prerequisite-full-deployment, fabric-integration-200-fabric-workspace-configuration • **Technologies:** Terraform, Microsoft Fabric, Azure IoT Operations, EventStream, KQL (Kusto Query Language), MQTT

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Basic Product Requirements Document Creation**](katas/product-requirements/100-basic-prd-creation.md)
  *Foundation | 60 min* • Learn to create structured product requirements documents using AI assistance and the PRD chatmode for edge AI solutions
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Basic Project Planning Prompt Usage**](katas/project-planning/100-basic-prompt-usage.md)
  *Foundation | 30 min* • Learn basic prompt engineering for project planning and develop structured planning workflows using AI assistance
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot

- [ ] [**Kata: 100 - Edge Documentation Planning**](katas/task-planning/100-edge-documentation-planning.md)
  *Foundation | 45 min* • Learn systematic task planning through practical documentation improvement using Azure project planning principles
  **Prerequisites:** None • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot

  **Prerequisites:** ado-automation-200-create-single-task • **Technologies:** Azure DevOps, MCP, Work Items, User Stories, GitHub Copilot

- [ ] [**Kata: 200 - Advanced Observability Stack**](katas/adr-creation/200-advanced-observability-stack.md)

  *Skill | 60 min* • Learn GitHub Copilot Edit Mode fundamentals including activation methods, file selection strategies, and coordinated multi-file editing for consistent codebase changes

- [ ] [**Kata: 200 - GitHub Copilot Edit Mode for IaC Patterns**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/200-copilot-edit-mode-iac-patterns.md)
  *Skill | 60 min* • Apply GitHub Copilot Edit Mode to Infrastructure as Code workflows including Terraform consistency, Bicep type coordination, and Kubernetes manifest patterns
  **Prerequisites:** ai-assisted-engineering-200-copilot-edit-mode-basics • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot, GitHub Copilot Edit Mode, Terraform, Bicep, Kubernetes

- [ ] [**Kata: 200 - Token-Efficient Context Strategies**](katas/ai-assisted-engineering/200-token-efficient-context.md)
  *Skill | 30 min* • Learn efficient token usage, minimize verbose context, and build precise prompting patterns for optimal AI assistance
  **Prerequisites:** ai-assisted-engineering-100-conversation-checkpoint-restore, ai-assisted-engineering-100-conversation-clearing-strategy • **Technologies:** GitHub Copilot Chat, VS Code

- [ ] [**Kata: 200 - Fabric Workspace Configuration**](katas/fabric-integration/200-fabric-workspace-configuration.md)

- [ ] [**Kata: 200 - Prerequisite Full Deployment**](katas/fabric-integration/200-prerequisite-full-deployment.md)
